alert.note: Alert for St. Marys (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 21 at 11:59PM EDT until August 22 at 2:00AM EDT by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM EDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of southern Maryland, including the following county: St. Marys. * WHEN...Until 400 AM EDT. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1156 PM EDT, emergency management reported ongoing flooding across the warned area. Between 2 and 5.5 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Sheridan Point... Mechanicsville... Morganza... Helen... Loveville... Clements... Chaptico... Oakville... Bushwood... Oakley... Maddox... Sandgates... Hillville... Avenue... - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
